title: 服务器视距太近了
author: Yihc
txt_content:
做了一个战争服，但是视距太近了，只有考得20米远，玩家才会出现...
这样子狙击就变成拼刺刀的狙了啊！
我修改了view distance但是没有明显的效果...怎么办！求高手！

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
spigot.yml
verbose: false复制代码
改成 true
entity-tracking-range.players 复制代码
改成100
server.properties
view-distance复制代码
改成10
启动的时候，你看会有一段这样的信息
[10:27:21 INFO]: -------- World Settings For [world] --------
[10:27:21 INFO]: Cactus Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Cane Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Melon Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Mushroom Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Pumpkin Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Sapling Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Wheat Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: NetherWart Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Vine Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Cocoa Growth Modifier: 100%
[10:27:21 INFO]: Entity Activation Range: An 32 / Mo 32 / Mi 16
[10:27:21 INFO]: Entity Tracking Range: Pl 48 / An 48 / Mo 48 / Mi 32 / Other 64
[10:27:21 INFO]: Hopper Transfer: 8 Hopper Check: 1 Hopper Amount: 1
[10:27:21 INFO]: Random Lighting Updates: false
[10:27:21 INFO]: Structure Info Saving: true
[10:27:21 INFO]: Custom Map Seeds:  Village: 10387312 Feature: 14357617 Monument: 10387313 Slime: 987234911
[10:27:21 INFO]: Mob Spawn Range: 4
[10:27:21 INFO]: Max TNT Explosions: 100
[10:27:21 INFO]: Tile Max Tick Time: 50ms Entity max Tick Time: 50ms
[10:27:21 INFO]: Item Despawn Rate: 6000
[10:27:21 INFO]: Item Merge Radius: 2.5
[10:27:21 INFO]: View Distance: 10

[10:27:21 INFO]: Allow Zombie Pigmen to spawn from portal blocks: true
[10:27:21 INFO]: Experience Merge Radius: 3.0
[10:27:21 INFO]: Zombie Aggressive Towards Villager: true
[10:27:21 INFO]: Nerfing mobs spawned from spawners: false
...
复制代码
你找一下entity-tracking-range.players这里显示的值是多少
有2个可能
1. K锅的问题，换服务器
2. 你设置的值服务端认为是无效的

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
spigot.yml
entity-tracking-range项，控制实体可见范围。
你应该只需要修改player项
以下的官方解释Description: Controls the range in blocks that entities will become "visible" or otherwise known as "tracked" to the client. Entities outside of this range will be invisible as they are not being rendered to preserve CPU usage and bandwidth. This is particularly useful for PVP servers, as turning down the player range will 'nerf' wallhacks and radar to some extent. Miscellaneous controls the range for item frames, paintings, dropped items, experience orbs, and sign text. Other is a general maximum limit for all entities on your server.
Does not improve server performance to change these values. These will only help client side lag when lowering these. 复制代码
大意是这个选项只控制客户端可见的实体范围

replies.txt_content:

entity-tracking-range项，控制实体可见范围。

我去试试看，谢谢你啦，如果我只单调这个，然后我可以把view distance调回5，会有影响吗？

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
Yihc 发表于 2017-6-9 22:47
我去试试看，谢谢你啦，如果我只单调这个，然后我可以把view distance调回5，会有影响吗？ ...
view-distance控制发送给客户端的区块范围
entity-tracking-range 控制发送给客户端实体的范围
区块的范围当然要大于实体渲染的范围，是吧
